data.name: EVE Online - Omega Subscription
data.detailed_description:
Steam EVE accounts product

  • This content can only be accessed with EVE Online accounts created through Steam. Existing EVE Online accounts not created through Steam cannot benefit from it.


About the Game

  • Upgrading to Omega will boost your training speed to double that of a free Alpha account, allowing you to progress at an even faster rate in EVE Online.

  • In addition, it will unlock some of EVE's best ships and skills, as well as removing the skill cap. It allows access to the entire skill tree of EVE, making over 350 ships available as your training progresses.
  • Omega also unlocks game features that are limited for Alpha Accounts, including exclusive Triglavian ship piloting, exporting from planetary colonies, full access to the contracts system, plus lower taxes on manufacturing and research jobs.
  • If your Omega subscription elapses, you will switch back to an Alpha account. Alphas are unable to use or train the Omega skills, but all money, items and ships will remain. Your progress in the Omega skills is maintained, and as soon as you upgrade again, all your trained skills will be active.
  • Omega's flexibility lets you choose when and how you play. Your period of Omega subscription will begin from the moment you make your purchase.
  • Omega subscription is available in 1, 3, 6 and 12 month packages.

data.short_description: Upgrading to Omega premium membership will boost your training speed to double that of a free Alpha account, allowing you to progress at an even faster rate in EVE Online.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, Russian*, French*, Korean*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz, AMD Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 5450 or NVIDIA GeForce 420 or better with at least 1024 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 @ 3.6 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580 or better with at least 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 23 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 2.5 GHz | Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 12
  • Processor: Intel i7 Series @ 3.8 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5700 or better with at least 8 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 23 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
